mean_cn: v. 放弃，让出（权利，财产等），撤回
mean_en: to give up (something) :to give (something, such as power, control, or possession) to another person or group
word_etyma: re向后，相反+linqu离开+ish动词后缀→离开不再要→relinquish放弃
sentence: The desperate king relinquished his life beside the river.
sentence_trans: 心灰意冷的大王在河边结束了自己的生命。
